This site honors the do-not-track settin: This site honors the do-not-track setting found in most modern browsers and disables Google Analytics when it is present. We cannot automatically remove other tracking methods without severely impacting the use of the site. Should you wish to manually manage these tracking methods, reference the section on disabling cookies.

This site uses cookies for incremental i: This site uses cookies for incremental improvements. You may find the services function without them but at a reduced usability. For example, the site will not remember if you have previously paid for elementary OS; by default you will be asked to pay again.
